snippet: Wood, an emerging star, and Altidore, a veteran, stood out for their complementary efforts in the Americans’ loss to Mexico in a World Cup qualifier on Friday....
abstract: Play of forwards Jozy Altidore and Bobby Wood is among few positives for United States men's national soccer team, whose 2-1 loss to Mexico was its first home defeat in World Cup qualifier in 15 years; fans and media are question coach Jurgen Klinsmann's tactical choices.
lead_paragraph: Wood, an emerging star, and Altidore, a veteran, stood out for their complementary efforts in the Americans’ loss to Mexico in a World Cup qualifier on Friday.

headline.main: Bobby Wood and Jozy Altidore Step Forward as U.S. Team Is Set Back
headline.print_headline: 2 Americans Step Forward Even as Team Is Set Back

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
